info.title: Puddle Backend
info.description:
Backend API for Puddle, a dataset marketplace platform enabling
    seamless interaction between dataset vendors and buyers, with AI agent
    support for enhanced dataset processing and management. 
    Features include user authentication, dataset management, vector
    similarity search, chat functionality, and comprehensive API
    documentation.

post.description:
Create a new vendor profile in the marketplace.

    - Only users with the **vendor** role can create their vendor profile.
    - A user can have only one vendor profile linked to their account.

get.description: Get a paginated list of all vendors in the marketplace. Accessible to all authenticated users.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of vendors to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of vendors to return

schema.title: Response List Vendors Api V1 Vendors  Get

get.description: Retrieve the vendor profile associated with the current logged-in user. Only accessible by vendors.
Retrieve a vendorâ€™s full profile using their UUID. Accessible to all authenticated users.

parameters.name: vendor_id

schema.description: The UUID of the vendor to retrieve
schema.title: Vendor Id

parameters.description: The UUID of the vendor to retrieve

put.description:
Update a vendorâ€™s profile information.

    - **Admins** can update any vendor.
    - **Vendors** can only update their own profile.

parameters.name: vendor_id

schema.description: The UUID of the vendor to update
schema.title: Vendor Id

parameters.description: The UUID of the vendor to update

delete.description:
Delete a vendor and all associated resources.

    - **Admins** can delete any vendor.
    - **Vendors** can delete only their own profile.

parameters.name: vendor_id

schema.description: The UUID of the vendor to delete
schema.title: Vendor Id

parameters.description: The UUID of the vendor to delete

post.description: Only users with role='buyer' can create their buyer profile.

get.description:
Accessible to:
    - **Admin**: can view all buyers.
    - **Vendor**: can view all buyers.
    - **Buyer**: can view all buyers (for discovery).

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of buyers to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of buyers to return

schema.title: Response Get Buyers Api V1 Buyers  Get

get.description: Accessible to admins, vendors, or the buyer themselves.

parameters.name: buyer_id

schema.description: The UUID of the buyer to retrieve
schema.title: Buyer Id

parameters.description: The UUID of the buyer to retrieve

put.description: Buyers can update their own profile. Admins can update any profile.

parameters.name: buyer_id

schema.description: The UUID of the buyer to update
schema.title: Buyer Id

parameters.description: The UUID of the buyer to update

delete.description: Admin-only route for deleting buyer profiles.

parameters.name: buyer_id

schema.description: The UUID of the buyer to delete
schema.title: Buyer Id

parameters.description: The UUID of the buyer to delete

post.description: Create a new AI agent (Admin or Vendor only).

get.description:
- Admin: list all agents.
- Vendor: list only own agents.
- Buyer: read-only list view of all agents (marketplace discovery).

schema.title: Response List Agents Api V1 Agents  Get

put.description: Update an AI agent's configuration (Admin or owning Vendor).

delete.description: Delete an AI agent (Admin or owning Vendor).

get.description:
List datasets for the marketplace.
- Buyers see PUBLIC datasets.
- Admins see ALL datasets.
- Vendors see PUBLIC datasets (they use /me/ for their own).

schema.title: Response List Datasets Api V1 Datasets  Get

get.description: Get all datasets owned by the currently authenticated vendor.

schema.title: Response List My Datasets Api V1 Datasets Me  Get

post.description:
Create a new user with hashed password.
- email: user email (must be unique)
- password: plaintext password
- role: user role (buyer/vendor/admin)
- full_name: optional full name

Authenticate user and return JWT token.
Expects form data with:
- username (email)
- password

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated user's info.
